name: Hilda32
author: skeddles
description:
This
 is based off the cartoon Hilda, which has some beautiful art, in no 
small part due to the colors. I created this by grabbing colors from 
over a dozen screenshots from the show, and picking out the most 
important colors. I originally had over 70, but reduced it to a much 
smaller 32 so it would better reflect the cartoon's simplicity. This is 
intended to be used for daytime scenes, I did not include dusk or night 
scenes, as I felt they wouldn't mix well (they could possibly made as 
separate palettes). I originally made this in 2020 but wasn't totally 
happy with it until I posted in with some other unfinished palettes on 
discord, and there seemed to be some demand to finish it. So I spend a 
few hours putting some final touches on it, and am pretty happy with the
 result! I would reccomend looking at some hilda screenshots for ideas 
on how to use it.
